single_crochet in same st and in the end of each row around there should be 32 sts evenly spaced around the cuff 32 single_crochet 2-13 continue working in the round up to row 13 using a stitch marker if needed to keep track thumb hole at the end of row 13 work the thumb hole as follows 14 chain 6 skip next 6 st single_crochet in 7th st and continue working single_crochet s in the round when you hole single_crochet in same st and in each st around and work 1 extra st in either corner 14 single_crochet 2-4 continue working in single_crochet in the round at the end of this row slip_stitch into
